text:
July 24, 1956
Miss Anna L. Hyer
Associate Executive Secretary
Department of Audio-Visual Instruction
National Education Association
1201 Sixteenth Street Northwest
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Miss Hyert
In response to your letter of July 18, I am returning the sheets you enclosed
with the information you requested* Since the JEFFERSONIAN HERITAGE and WAYS
OF MANKIND I-11 are NABB produced, I am enclosing sane descriptive material on
them*
If I can be of further assistance, please feel free to contact me*
Sincerely,
Robert E. Underwood, Jr.
Network Manager
REUjdfc
Enclosures
